title: Roae Issues Statement Prior to Veterans Memorial Stadium Budget Rally (Todd Rock)
text: ( Source : Todd Rock ) MEADVILLE - With a rally scheduled today at 3 p.m. at Veterans Memorial Stadium in Erie to push for the enactment of a state budget in Harrisburg , state Rep. Brad Roae (R-Erie/Crawford) issued the following statement: 'I
